subtasks_completed: Created src/lib/report.ts module with generateRunId, buildReport, and writeReport functions
Implemented generateRunId() with timestamp + random suffix format
Implemented buildReport(tickData) to construct complete ReportData from tick results
Implemented writeReport(report, path) using atomicWriteJson for atomic writes
Included blast_radius, scope check result, diff summary, and verification runs transformation
notes: ReportData interface already exists in src/types/report.ts and matches report.schema.json
generateRunId is exported as generateReportRunId to avoid conflict with existing generateRunId from state.ts
buildReport accepts TickReportData interface with all necessary tick execution data
Verification runs are transformed from verify.ts format to report format with phase, cmd, args
All required fields from report.schema.json are populated in buildReport
